com.appunta.android.location
Class LocationReader

java.lang.Object
  com.appunta.android.location.LocationReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.location.LocationListener
public class LocationReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.location.LocationListener

This class is a helper to work with the Location Providers (both GPS and Network)

Author:
Sergi Martínez

Nested Class Summary
static interface LocationReader.OnLocationObtainedListener
          This interface should implemented in order to receive new locations
static interface LocationReader.OnNoProvidersListener
          This interface should be implemented in order to receive a warning when no providers are working
